Events.Name: Boss Hold
Events.Description:
Holds Cooldowns at 15% boss HP. 
Reccomended to use this for the first two dungeon bosses.

Events.Name: Group Hold
Events.Description:
Holds cooldowns at 40% HP, in packs greater than 3. 
Reccomended to toggle this manually before AOE during dungeons for best results.

Events.Name: Auto Buddymit
Events.Description: Automatically gives Intervention to cotank at 80%. This HP value is adjustable in conditions.

Conditions.Name: Auto Buddymit
Conditions.Description: Condition requiring tank partner to be in combat with you.

Logics.Name: Enable CDs
Logics.Description:
Automatically reenables cooldowns when detecting an enemy with nearly full HP.
Set to 90% default.

Items.Name: Boss Hold
Items.Description: Holds cooldowns at 15 percent HP. Toggle for the first two bosses in dungeon.

Items.Name: Group Hold
Items.Description: Holds cooldowns in big pulls. Use while pulling in dungeons, toggle off for a boss fight.

Items.Name: Last Boss
Items.Description: Enables burn boss at 5 percent HP boss health. Enable this for the last boss of a dungeon, or for any trial/raid with only one phase.

Items.Name: Enable CDs
Items.Description: Reenables cooldowns on target of a full HP enemy. Use this in conjunction with Boss Hold and Group Hold for best results in dungeons.

Items.Name: Stun Mob
Items.Description: Uses low blow in packs, turn off for boss fights.

Items.Name: Reprisal RW
Items.Description: Uses Reprisal to mitigate incoming raidwide damage.

Items.Name: Shake RW
Items.Description: Uses Shake it Off to mitigate incoming raidwide damage.

Items.Name: 2 Mits AOE
Items.Description: Uses a second mitigation under 40 percent HP in pulls with 3 or more enemies. Use in conjunction with 1 Mits AOE.

Items.Name: 1 Mits AOE
Items.Description: Uses 1 mitigation while tanking a group of 3 or more enemies.

Items.Name: Buddymit
Items.Description: Will use Nascent Flash on CoTank automatically in raids/trials at certain HP levels. TURN OFF BLOODWHETTING TO USE THIS.

Items.Name: Stance OT
Items.Description: Will manage stance automatically for Off-Tanks in raids. Enable stance in the end of your opener to use this effectively.
